metadata.description: Langley High, located just under two miles from the CIA Headquarters, is home to students that are barely aware of the important role that their parents play in the country’s security. When Andrew Sullivan’s father is abducted, and the truth covered up by the government, he goes on the run. With the help of some other students and one of his teachers, Andrew tries to save his father and ends up uncovering a conspiracy much larger than anyone could have expected.
metadata.name: Langley High
